mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(replyno, productno, membersno, content, passwd, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(replyno), 0) + 1 as replyno FROM reply), #{productno}, #{membersno}, #{content}, #{passwd}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, productno, membersno, content, passwd, rdate FROM reply ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT replyno, productno, membersno, content, passwd, rdate FROM reply WHERE productno=#{productno} ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT m.id, r.replyno, r.productno, r.membersno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate FROM members m, reply r WHERE (m.membersno = r.membersno) AND r.productno=#{productno} ORDER BY r.replyno DESC
